alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Castle Country; South Central Utah; Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 12 at 2:56PM MDT until June 13 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Uinta Basin, Castle Country, Bryce Canyon Country and South Central Utah. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Patchy blowing dust is possible, which may cause reduced visibility as well as rapid fluctuations in visibility. Winds will cause difficult travel conditions for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers, especially along east to west oriented routes. Gusty winds will cause rough conditions on area waterways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Castle Country; South Central Utah; Western Uinta Basin
